ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes or concepts that are used to assess neurological status in a patient. Assessing neurological status includes assessment of consciousness, responsiveness and/or mental status of the patient.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Assessment, Performed. The intent of this data element is to assess the neurological status in a patient.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with LOINC codes identifying assessment of consciousness, responsiveness and/or mental status of the patient.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
